registeredAgent.label: Registered Agent
registeredAgent.sectionDescription: Enter your `Registered Agent's|registered-agent` ID number. If your agent did not give you this number, you can enter their name and address.
registeredAgent.radioButtonNumberText: Enter Your Registered Agent ID Number
registeredAgent.sameAddressCheckbox: The address is the same as the business location.
registeredAgent.sameContactCheckbox: The agent information is the same as the account holder.

general.paymentDisclaimer: You will be brought to a secure payment platform operated by New Jersey's partner NICUSA Inc. to process your payment.
general.ariaContextWillNeedToProvideBusinessDate: Provide your business effective date to update the task status
general.ariaContextWillLooseCalendarAndCertifica: You need to confirm your information to update your task status
general.amendmentInfo:
#### Review your information before submitting to the New Jersey Division of Revenue and Enterprise Services.
 If you need to make a change after submitting, you must file an [amendment online.](https://www.njportal.com/dor/businessamendments)

intro.default:
This online application will register your business name and form your `business structure|business-structure-learn-more` with the New Jersey Division of Revenue and Enterprise Services.

This form will take about 5–10 minutes to complete. You will have completed formation and obtained an `Entity ID|entity-id` immediately after payment is received.

You will need to fill out a [paper application](https://www.nj.gov/treasury/revenue/pdf/2000.pdf) to register if you choose to `reserve your business name.|name-reservation` Business name reservations only last six months.
intro.foreign: You must register your business name and form your business with the State. To do this, you first need to see if your business name is available.

sections.servicesDescription: Use the table below to select all the services you’d like to purchase as well as the payment type. The total amount will change based on the payment type selected.

errorBanner.genericApiError: Review the information in the fields below for errors:
errorBanner.errorOnStep: Review the information in the fields below for errors or omissions:
errorBanner.incompleteStepsError: Check the steps below for missing information or errors:
errorBanner.apiResubmitText: After you make the correction, resubmit the form.

paymentType.costTotalPaymentDisclaimer: * Fees are subject to change. Your total amount may vary.
paymentType.label: Payment Type

canMakeDistribution.label: Partnership Rights - Make distributions
canMakeDistribution.body: Do general partners have the right to make distributions to any partner? (This includes a return of all or any part of the partner's contributions).
canMakeDistribution.reviewStepNo: **No**, general partners do not have the right to make distributions to any partner. (This includes a return of all or any part of the partner's contributions).
canMakeDistribution.reviewStepYes: **Yes**, general partners have the right to make distributions to any partner. (This includes a return of all or any part of the partner's contributions).

nonprofitTrusteesMethodSpecified.label: Provisions - Trustees
nonprofitTrusteesMethodSpecified.body: The method for choosing trustees are specified

additionalProvisions.label: Additional Provisions/Articles
additionalProvisions.body: Provisions help you prevent personal legal liabilities and clarify board members' rights and duties to the company to prevent misunderstandings. You can list up to 10 provisions; consider including the information on operations, finances, `class of shares|shares-class` structure, and details on the rights of the Board of Directors.

dissolution.label: Dissolution
dissolution.body: When and under what circumstances can a limited partnership and its affairs dissolve?

directors.successSnackbarBody: A director has been added successfully.
directors.label: Board of Directors
directors.description:
List each `Board of Directors’|board-directors` name and address. You need at least 1 and can have up to 10 Directors listed.

Board of Directors’ names are listed on the Certificate of Formation and will have the ability to file and sign documents.

limited-liability-partnership.description: Authorized Partner(s) should sign below by adding their full name. You can have up to 10 signers listed.

foreign-limited-liability-company.description: `Authorized representative(s)|authorized-representative` or `general partner(s)|general-partner` should sign below by adding their full name. You can have up to 10 signers listed.

signers.aidText: By checking this box I confirm that I'm an authorized signer.
signers.errorBannerSignerName: One or more Signer fields are empty.
signers.errorInlineNameAndSignature: Enter a signer’s name and click the checkbox to authorize their signature.
signers.label: Signers
signers.errorInlineSignature: Click the checkbox to authorize the signer’s signature.
signers.errorBannerCheckbox: Sign by clicking the checkbox above.
signers.description: Authorized Representative(s) should sign below by adding their full name. You can have up to 10 signers listed.
signers.errorInlineAdditionalSignerName: Enter the first and last name of each signer.

addressLine1.label: Address Line 1
addressLine1.error: Enter your business's street name and number.

nonprofitBoardMemberRightsSpecified.label: Provisions - Board Member Rights
nonprofitBoardMemberRightsSpecified.body: The rights and limitations of the board members are specified

hasNonprofitBoardMembers.label: Provisions - Board Members
hasNonprofitBoardMembers.yesReviewText: **Yes**, my Non-Profit will have board members.
hasNonprofitBoardMembers.noReviewText: **No**, my Non-Profit will not have board members.

canGetDistribution.label: Partnership Rights - Receive distributions
canGetDistribution.body: Do limited partners have the right to receive distributions from a partner? (This can include a return of all or any part of their partner's contributions).
canGetDistribution.reviewStepYes: **Yes**, the limited partners have the right to receive distributions from a partner. (This can include a return of all or any part of their partner's contributions).
canGetDistribution.reviewStepNo: **No**, the limited partners do not have the right to receive distributions from a partner. (This can include a return of all or any part of their partner's contributions).

agentOfficeAddressLine1.label: Office Address Line 1
agentOfficeAddressLine1.error: Enter the agent's office street name and number.

limited-partnership.description:
List each General Partners' name and address. You can have up to 10 General Partners listed.

General Partners are listed on the Certificate of Formation and will have the ability to file and sign documents.

incorporators.successSnackbarBody: A signer has been added successfully.
incorporators.label: Signers
incorporators.description:
List each `Incorporators'|incorporator` name and address. You can have up to 10 Incorporators listed.

Incorporators are listed on the Certificate of Formation and will have the ability to file and sign documents.

businessName.alertRestrictedWord: "${name}" contains the restricted word "${word}" that cannot be used in the Business Name for online filing. If you would like to use this restricted word, please contact us with your preferred name at [treasury.](https://www.state.nj.us/treasury/revenue/revgencode.shtml)
businessName.alertSpecialCharacters: "${name}" contains invalid special characters that cannot be used in the Business Name for online filing. If you'd like to use special characters you need to file a paper application using the form located at [treasury.](https://www.state.nj.us/treasury/revenue/pdf/2000.pdf)

foreign.header: Check Availability of Your Business Name
foreign.description:
Your business name must match **exactly** with the business name registered in your state of origin, you can find this on your original `Certificate of Formation|certificate-formation` . **This search tool does not register your name with the State.**

Please check if your business name is available in New Jersey.

businessName.errorInlineEmpty: Enter a business name to check availability.
businessName.alertAvailable: "${name}" is available. This name will be registered with the State ONLY after you submit the rest of this form.
businessName.errorInlineUnavailable: This name is already being used. Try another business name.
businessName.alertDesignator: It looks like there's a designator in your name like LLC, LP, or CORP. Please remove it and try your search again. You can officially form your business and choose a designator once you find an available name.
businessName.alertUnavailable: "${name}" isn't available. Try another name. You can officially form your business once you've found an available name.
businessName.label: Business Name
businessName.description:
We’ll check to see if your desired business name is available. Once you find an available name you can use it to complete this form.

What do you want to name your business?
businessName.errorInlineNeedsToSearch: Confirm the availability of your business name.

nonprofitAssetDistributionSpecified.label: Provisions - Asset Distribution
nonprofitAssetDistributionSpecified.body: The method for distributing assets are specified

agentNumber.label: Registered Agent ID Number
agentNumber.error: Enter the 4 to 7 digit Registered Agent ID number.

corpWatchNotification.checkboxText: I want to sign up for CorpWatch Alerts to notify me when any charter document filing is performed for my business.

addressMunicipality.label: City
addressMunicipality.infoAlert: **Can't find your city?** Unincorporated places are not listed here. Search for [your official jurisdiction](https://www.nj.gov/nj/gov/county/localities.html) (type in your community's name into the local name field).

businessStartDate.label: NJ Business Effective Date
businessStartDate.errorFuture: The NJ business effective date must be today or a future date in format MM/DD/YYYY.
businessStartDate.errorToday: The NJ business effective date must be today and in format MM/DD/YYYY.
businessStartDate.error30Days: The NJ business effective date must be today or a future date within 30 days in format MM/DD/YYYY.
businessStartDate.error90Days: The NJ business effective date must be today or a future date within 90 days in format MM/DD/YYYY.

businessSuffix.label: Business Designator
businessSuffix.optionsUpdatedSnackbarAlert: Your Business Designator list has been updated. Please make your selection from the dropdown menu.

willPracticeLaw.label: Will you practice law?
willPracticeLaw.subtitle: Selecting "Yes" will change the Business Designations available for your business.

agentEmail.label: Registered Agent Email
agentEmail.error: Confirm the email matches format: name@example.com

foreignDateOfFormation.label: Original Date of Formation
foreignDateOfFormation.error: The business formation date must be a valid date in format MM/DD/YYYY

combinedInvestment.label: Combined Investment
combinedInvestment.body: List the funds and the value of properties and services each of the partners have agreed to contribute.

members.successSnackbarBody: A member has been added successfully.
members.subheader: (Complete this section if you are a multi-member LLC)
members.label: Members
members.description: List each LLC's members' name and address. You may list up to 10 members. Members can be individuals or entities and are the owners of the LLC. Members do not own the LLC's property. They may or may not manage the business and affairs.

foreignGoodStandingFile.label: Foreign Certificate of Good Standing
foreignGoodStandingFile.helperText: Select a PNG or PDF file. Max file size: 3MB.
foreignGoodStandingFile.errorMessageRequired: A Certificate of Good Standing is required.

canCreateLimitedPartner.label: Partnership Rights - Assign rights
canCreateLimitedPartner.body: Can limited partners assign other partners limited partner rights?
canCreateLimitedPartner.reviewStepNo: **No**, the limited partners cannot assign other partners limited partner rights.
canCreateLimitedPartner.reviewStepYes: **Yes**, the limited partners can assign other partners limited partner rights.

foreign.label: Postal Code
foreign.errorIntl: Enter a 1 to 11 digit Postal Code.

trustees.successSnackbarBody: A trustee has been added successfully.
trustees.label: Board of Trustees
trustees.description:
List each board of trustees name and address. You need a minimum of 3 trustees and can have up to 10 listed.

Board of Trustees names are listed on the `Certificate of Formation|certificate-formation` and have the ability to file and sign documents.

isVeteranNonprofit.label: Non-Profit Veteran Corporation
isVeteranNonprofit.description: Is your Domestic Non-Profit a `Veteran Corporation|veteran-corporation` ?
isVeteranNonprofit.reviewTextYes: **Yes**, my Domestic Non-Profit is a Veteran Corporation.
isVeteranNonprofit.reviewTextNo: **No**, my Domestic Non-Profit is not a Veteran Corporation.

annualReportNotification.checkboxText: I want to be reminded of any annual report filing(s), so that I never miss an annual report deadline.

businessPurpose.label: Business Purpose
businessPurpose.body: Describe your business's primary activities but refrain from using any `reserved words.|reserved-words` This allows your business to be searchable on the Public Record.

withdrawals.label: Withdrawals
withdrawals.body: If a general partner withdraws from the partnership, what are the remaining partners rights to contribute to the business?

addressLine1.label: Address Line 1
addressLine1.error: Enter your street name and number.

legalStructure.warningModalBody: If you change your proposed business structure in your business profile, you might need to complete a different form. Don't worry, once you update your profile we'll tell you which form you need and where to complete it.
legalStructure.label: Business Structure
legalStructure.warningModalHeader: You Might Need a Different Form

partnershipRights.label: Partnership Rights
partnershipRights.radioNoText: No, they do not have the right
